trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.

Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> events to implement virtual mode in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValueEventArgs"></xref> class.
The index of the column containing the cell that the event occurs for.
The index of the row containing the cell that the event occurs for.
Gets a value indicating the column index of the cell that the event occurs for.
Use this offset with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> property to reference the cell that the event occurs for.
The index of the column containing the cell that the event occurs for.
Gets a value indicating the row index of the cell that the event occurs for.
Use this offset with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property to reference the cell that the event occurs for.
The index of the row containing the cell that the event occurs for.
Gets or sets the value of the cell that the event occurs for.
Use this property to inspect the cell's value when handling an event, or to communicate the cell's current value if creating an event.
